statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

article.headline: San Francisco 79, Pacific 69
article.story: SAN FRANCISCO -- Angelo Caloiaro had his third double-double of the season with a career-high 29 points and 11 rebounds and San Francisco continued its best start in seven seasons with a 79-69 win over Pacific on Saturday night. Rashad Green added 18 points and four assists while Dominique O'Connor added 10 points for the Dons, who won their third straight following back-to-back losses to Murray State and New Mexico State. San Francisco (8-3) trailed by 10 late in the first half but missed only nine shots after the break. Ross Rivera had 15 points and three others scored 10 points apiece for Pacific (4-4), which had trouble all night defending in the paint.
